component.name: Wez's Terminal Emulator
component.summary: A GPU-accelerated cross-platform terminal emulator and multiplexer

description.p: wezterm is a terminal emulator with support for modern features such as fonts with ligatures, hyperlinks, tabs and multiple windows.

Featuring more powerful key and mouse bindings, new lua functions for working with color, json, time, processes and windows, reduced scrollback memory consumption, increased search performance, IME on Wayland and more!
